app.title: Rights Request Generator
app.tagline: Create privacy and consumer rights letters without your details ever leaving the browser.
app.footerNote: No data is stored or sent to a server. Everything you type stays in your browser.

gdpr.heading: GDPR rights request
gdpr.description: Generate GDPR Article 14 information requests or Article 17 erasure requests in one place.

dataSource.label: How they obtained your data (if known)
dataSource.placeholder: e.g. purchased from a marketing list

legal.heading: Legal references
items: Article 15: right of access for the data subject
Article 17: right to erasure (‘right to be forgotten’)
Article 19: notification obligation regarding rectification or erasure

information.subjectLine: Subject: Right of access under GDPR Article 14
information.intro: I am contacting you to exercise my right to information under the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) Article 14, which covers personal data about me obtained from sources other than myself.
information.requestListIntro: Please provide the following information within the time limit in Article 12(3):
bulletItems: the categories of personal data you process about me
the source of that data (and, if applicable, the type of source)
the purposes of the processing and the legal basis relied upon
the recipients or categories of recipients who have received or will receive the data
the planned retention periods or the criteria used to determine those periods
the rights available to me, including access, rectification, erasure, restriction, objection, and data portability
my right to lodge a complaint with the supervisory authority
any automated decision-making or profiling, including meaningful information about the logic involved
information.dataSourceLine: To the best of my knowledge, the data was obtained via: {{dataSource}}.
postListParagraphs: {{dataSourceLine}}I also request a copy of the personal data being processed, pursuant to Article 15.
If you require additional information to confirm my identity, please let me know as soon as possible. I would prefer to receive your response by email or another secure channel.
Thank you for your assistance. I look forward to your response within the statutory deadline.

erasure.subjectLine: Subject: Request for erasure under GDPR Article 17
paragraphs: I am hereby requesting immediate erasure of all personal data concerning me in accordance with Article 17 GDPR.
Please erase all personal data concerning me as defined by Article 4(1) GDPR and confirm once this has been completed.
If I have previously given consent to the processing of my personal data, I am withdrawing that consent for the entire processing activity effective immediately.
I am of the view that the conditions in Article 17(1) GDPR are fulfilled. No exception in Article 17(3) GDPR applies, in particular because I am not a public figure.

If you have made the data public, Article 17(2) GDPR obliges you to take all reasonable steps to inform other controllers, including search engine operators, that I have requested the erasure of any links, copies, or replications. This applies to direct copies as well as derivative entries.

If the data has been disclosed to third parties, Article 19 GDPR requires you to communicate this erasure request, including any references to the data, to each recipient. Please also inform me of those recipients.
Please acknowledge receipt of this request and confirm the erasure at your earliest convenience.

angrerett.heading: Norwegian right to cancel
angrerett.description: Generate a cancellation letter under the Norwegian Right of Withdrawal Act of 20 June 2014 no. 27.
angrerett.formAria: Details for Norwegian right to cancel letter

itemDescription.label: Product or service (optional)
itemDescription.placeholder: Description of the item or service

angrerett.formHint: No information is stored. The letter is generated only in your browser.

legal.heading: Legal references
items: Right of Withdrawal Act of 20 June 2014 no. 27, section 20 first paragraph
Section 24: refund obligations when the right is exercised
Section 25: consumer's duty to return goods

templates.service:
Hello,

I refer to my agreement with {{company}}{{accountSegment}}{{serviceItemSegment}}{{serviceAgreementSegment}}.

Under the Norwegian Right of Withdrawal Act of 20 June 2014 no. 27, I hereby unequivocally exercise my right of withdrawal and terminate the agreement, cf. section 20 first paragraph.

I request that the agreement be considered cancelled from the time this notice is received and that any amounts paid be refunded in accordance with the Act. Please confirm in writing that my withdrawal has been registered, and confirm the refund and termination of the subscription.

If you require a specific form or any additional information to complete the process, please send it to me without undue delay.

Kind regards
{{customer}}
{{today}}
